findings.rationale: The obligations under this Agreement continue indefinitely, which may impose ongoing legal exposure and liability without a clear endpoint.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnification without limits can lead to significant financial exposure, particularly in case of a breach or legal claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: Lack of limitation on liability can expose a party to potentially unlimited financial damages, creating a significant risk in contractual obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of intellectual property rights to Company A may disadvantage Company B, limiting their ability to utilize developed work.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The clause favoring the prevailing party for attorney fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to potential financial burdens.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
